Introducing Jotty. A simple yet powerful password-protected note-taking extension designed for seamless use right in your browser. Jotty automatically saves and updates your notes across every open tab, ensuring you never lose track of your thoughts.

Key Features:

*Ad-Free Experience: Enjoy an uninterrupted note-taking experience without intrusive ads or distractions.

*Enhanced Security: Keep your notes safe by setting a password to unlock them. Your personal information is protected, giving you peace of mind while jotting down sensitive details.

*Multiple Secure Notes: Create and store multiple notes, each securely locked behind your password. Switch between notes effortlessly while maintaining privacy.

*Download Options: Save your notes in multiple formats! Easily download your notes TXT files for offline access or sharing.

*Print Your Notes: Need a hard copy? Jotty allows you to print your notes directly from the extension, making it simple to keep physical records of your thoughts.

*Emergency Bulk Delete: In the event of an emergency, quickly delete all your notes with a single command. This feature ensures your information can be wiped clean at any moment, enhancing your privacy.

*Advanced Formatting Options: Customize your notes with rich formatting options. Make your text bold, italic, or underlined, and create lists or insert links with ease.

*Color Customization: Change the text and background colors to match your style or mood. Personalize your note-taking environment to make it truly yours.

*Security & Privacy Focused
Your security is our priority. With Jotty, you can rest assured that your notes are safe and sound. The password protection feature ensures that only you have access to your personal notes, while the emergency bulk delete option gives you full control over your information.
